name: Spells
description: In $(sorcerycraft), you practice magic with rituals and $(spell). $(br2)$(spell) take the form of scrolls and are $(bold)one-time use only.$() You do have to craft them again to profit the benefit of the spell once more. $(br2)Please note $(bold)XP Cost$() is expressed in $(bold)Levels$() and not Points. $(br2)By default, there is a $(bold)20% risk$() $(spells) rebound on you, unless first casting $(l:spell/steadfast)$(#94835d)$(bold)$(italic)Steadfast$().
